parts.text: {"word":"sorridere","priority":"★★★","meanings":[{"part_of_speech":"verb","transitivity":"vi","definition":"微笑む、ほほえむ","english_definition":"to smile","examples":[{"sentence":"Lei sorrise dolcemente.","translation":"She smiled sweetly.","english_translation":"彼女は優しく微笑んだ。"},{"sentence":"Sorridere fa bene all'anima.","translation":"Smiling is good for the soul.","english_translation":"微笑むことは魂に良い。"},{"sentence":"Nonostante tutto, continuava a sorridere.","translation":"Despite everything, he kept smiling.","english_translation":"何があっても、彼は微笑み続けた。"}],"collocations":["sorridere a qualcuno (人に微笑む)","sorridere di gioia (喜びで微笑む)","sorridere amaramente (苦笑する)","sorridere ironicamente (皮肉っぽく微笑む)"],"synonyms":["ghignare (ニヤニヤ笑う - よりネガティブな意味合い)","ridacchiare (くすくす笑う)"],"antonyms":["piangere (泣く)","urlare (叫ぶ)","adirarsi (怒る)"]}],"etymology":{"value":"ラテン語の 'subridere' (軽く笑う) から派生。'sub-' (下に、軽く) + 'ridere' (笑う)","priority":"★★☆"},"pronunciation":{"ipa":"/sorˈriːdere/","syllables":"sor-ri-de-re"},"inflection":{"verb_forms":{"present_simple":["sorrido","sorridi","sorride","sorridiamo","sorridete","sorridono"],"past_simple":["sorrisi","sorridesti","sorrise","sorridemmo","sorrideste","sorrisero"],"future_simple":["sorriderò","sorriderai","sorriderà","sorrideremo","sorriderete","sorrideranno"],"imperfect":["sorridevo","sorridevi","sorrideva","sorridevamo","sorridevate","sorridevano"],"subjunctive_present":["sorrida","sorrida","sorrida","sorridiamo","sorridiate","sorridano"],"subjunctive_imperfect":["sorridessi","sorridessi","sorridesse","sorridessimo","sorrideste","sorridessero"],"conditional_present":["sorriderei","sorrideresti","sorriderebbe","sorrideremmo","sorridereste","sorriderebbero"],"imperative":["","sorridi","sorrida","sorridiamo","sorridete","sorridano"],"gerund":"sorridendo","past_participle":"sorriso"}},"usage_notes":{"explanation":"'Sorridere' は、口角を上げて喜びや楽しさ、または親愛の情を示す表情を作ることを意味します。より控えめな笑顔を表し、'ridere' (笑う) より静かで穏やかなニュアンスを持ちます。皮肉や軽蔑を表す場合もありますが、通常はポジティブな感情を表します。","priority":"★★★"},"common_mistakes":{"examples":[{"incorrect":"✗ Io sono sorridendo.","correct":"✓ Io sorrido.","note":"'Sorridere' は自動詞なので、助動詞 'essere' (～である) を伴う進行形は通常使いません。"},{"incorrect":"✗ Sorridere a la telecamera.","correct":"✓ Sorridere alla telecamera.","note":"'Sorridere a' (～に微笑む) の後には、前置詞 'a' が必要です。女性名詞の前では 'alla' になります。"}],"priority":"★★☆"},"related_words":{"derivatives":["sorriso (名詞: 微笑み)","sorridente (形容詞: 微笑んでいる)"],"idioms_phrases":["sorridere alla vita (人生に微笑む - ポジティブな姿勢で生きる)","sorridere con gli occhi (目で微笑む - 感情が目に表れる)"],"priority":"★★★"},"level_frequency":{"CEFR":"B1","frequency_google_ngram":"比較的高頻度","priority":"★☆☆"},"readability_explanation":{"level":"B1","text":"'Sorridere' は「ほほえむ」という意味の動詞です。喜びや親しみやすさを示すときに使います。例えば、人に会ったときや、何か楽しいことがあったときに 'sorridere' ことができます。'Ridere' (笑う) よりも静かで控えめな表現です。","example_sentences":[{"sentence":"Il bambino sorrise alla madre.","translation":"The child smiled at his mother.","type":"example"},{"sentence":"Lei sorrise quando sentì la notizia.","translation":"She smiled when she heard the news.","type":"example"},{"sentence":"È importante sorridere ogni giorno.","translation":"It's important to smile every day.","type":"example"}]}]}
